basic_info.description_header: Fresh Graduate in Computer Science at Concordia University
basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I just recently got my bachelors in CS at Concordia University with a GPA of 3.4. I'm currently working as Software Developer at Broadsign International. I strive upon self-progression and learning new technologies. Feel free to contact me for more information :)

projects.title: aMuseMe.ai
projects.description: Music player that automatically plays songs based on the emotion conveyed through the facial expression of the user. 3rd place finisher in the Octave Group ConUHacks 5th Edition Hackathon Challenge.

projects.title: Paper.io
projects.description: Hackathon project in which teams compete against each other in a game of Paper.io. A strategy game where the goal is to occupy the most amount of territory while eliminating the rest of the players within a square board

projects.title: ATP Predictor
projects.description: Project comparing the efficiency of the Markov Chain method and logistic regression at predicting the outcome of tennis matches imported from a dataset from Kaggle
